items.sentence: You\'re probably too young to understand why Tom had to leave.
Tom speaks French with his mother and English with his father.
Tom didn\'t understand why he was different from other people.
Tom didn\'t want to talk to the press about his personal life.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t like what\'s going to happen.
I just learned something about Tom that I didn\'t know before.
I knew you were crazy, but I didn\'t know you were this crazy.
Tom thought it would be safe for Mary to walk home by herself.
Tom certainly hasn\'t inspired me to want to become a teacher.
Tom checked Mary\'s pulse to see whether she was alive or not.
